caption: Truly a genuine Italian small business.  It is a blessing to the area. Also great to see both owners on premise.
Fantastic dining experience!
If you never go to Italy the closest thing to it is this place!!!!! Better than anywhere in the north end!
Wood fired pizza and some of the best pasta I have had at a restaurant. This place is run by nice, hard-working people (from Italy) who provide great service. We will be back!
Excellent Italian pizza!

Great food and really nice people. Felt very comfortable eating inside. I went with my boyfriend but Tables are big enough that I would feel comfortable sitting across from a friend (outside of my household). Will definitely go back and/or order take out
Great salads, great pizza! The red pizza sauce is life, will definitely be ordering more often.
It was my first time, absolutely amazing.  Delicious food, delightful service.  Mateo and Franchesca are the best by far! Definitely will be there again. Thanks
Lovely restaurant. We enjoyed the wine selection. Excellent service.
(Translated by Google) If he eats well, very well!  (Original) Se mangia bene, molto bene!
Food and service...perfect!

I've lived in italy for 7 years . And this was the first time in 5 years of being here that i actually found a spot that makes real italian food. The people that run the place are very nice . This place really lives up to its name!

We are Ercole and Marian originally from Rome, Italy, currently living in Toronto, Canada. We were in Boston to run in the marathon, on April 15, 2019. We had asked some Italian friends from Harvard University to tip us on genuine Italian (that is, NO Chicken Parmesan and/or Spaghetti and Meat Balls - which, as any Italian knows, are NOT to be found on any menu anywhere in Italy - on the menu) restaurants in the area, and Real Italian Gusto in Medford topped their list. So on Saturday, April 13, 2019, we had one of our rare GENUINE Italian meal in North America. We met Francesca and Matteo, the Italian owners, who explained to us their wish to have their patrons enjoy their meals "As if they were dinner guests in an Italian home in Italy." That is precisely how my wife and I felt throughout our lovely evening at Francesca and Matteo's Real Italian Gusto restaurant in Medford, Ma. GRAZIE AMICI!!!!!, e ARRIVEDERCI a Boston/Medford.

Real Gusto has become our favorite takeout restaurant. Everything is fresh and tasty!! Never disappointed. My husband said he will not eat any other pizza, except Emilia. The pasta dishes are terrific!! Ingredients are always so fresh. So happy to support a local restaurant. Highly recommended!!

Best pastas and pizzas in Medford! Doing an amazing job with food to-go and indoor dining considering all of the restrictions with the pandemic! This is our go-to spot for a great pizza for a casual night. Definitely try the carbonara and we love their white pizzas!

My friend and I spent about an hour yesterday night trying to find a restaurant in the area that was open late-ish (9pm), had walk-in dine-in options and didn't have a wait. After trying 4 different restaurants, Real Italian Gusto was our fifth try and we were warmly welcomed, promptly seated and quickly served. Immediately entering the restaurant, I noticed not only how everything seemed very clean, but also adequate spacing that seemed to follow Covid precautions that made me feel safe and allowed me to fully enjoy an evening to celebrate a belated birthday with one of my best friends.  Service was wonderful. Prompt, attentive, kind and not pushy. I can't remember my server's name but I believe it began with a 'C'. I drink tons of water and she never made me feel bad for all my refills.  My friend and I ordered a small sarda salad, a small prosciutto di parma e burrata (charcuterie), bolognese pappardelle, gnocchi sorrentina and a speranza pizza. My favorite was probably the pizza, beautiful mix of flavors. I would've liked the dough to be cooked a little more for a bit of a crunch, but I loved how chewy it was. The bolognese sauce lacked seasoning in my opinion and the pappardelle pasta was too thick for me. The gnocchi was inconsistent. Absolutely wonderful for a few bites, some gnocchi just melting in your mouth and other bites the gnocchi was much harder and solid.  Overall I would love to return to try other dishes and would recommend this restaurant to others!
Fantastic food, we've only gotten takeout during covid.
Pizza was excellent, nice atmosphere, super friendly wait staff. Will definitely visit again.

This restaurant has some of the best Italian food I have had. The chicken is always cooked perfectly in all of their dishes, the bolognese sauce and pasta are wonderful, and we love the arancini. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for Italian food

First Time At Restaurant! Food Was Adequate;but Portions on the Small Side for Itaian Cuisine.  Restaurant Decor Kinda on the Sterile Side! Complete W/White Plastic Tables and Chairs..Noise Level High due to Sparse Furniture..Had the Home Made "Fusilli " Pasta on Side of Entree' Pretty Positive it Was Boxed ! Bread and Dipping Oil Nice Touch(Some Olives/Grated Cheese Would Have Completed It! Service Timely/Friendly..Three and a Half/Four Stars..
Very small place but serves food with very big flavor. No menu just order what you like.  A real good neighborhood restaurant.
Great apps and the best authentic pizza napoletana that we've found
Ordered the margherita pizza. Delizioso! The ingredients seemed fresh and the pizza was very light. Highly recommend!
Tried the margherita pizza: Taste 5/5, crust 5/5, sauce 5/5, middle half of pizza was soggy and thin (3/5)
If I'm ever back in the area, I'm definitely going here again!
Great food, great service. That's all you need to know.
Had a great experience here with my kids. The food came fast and the service is just great. Prices are reasonable.

I received the food delivered by Grubhub. It was very cold. I ordered pizza with salami and prosciutto and arancini. The taste of the meat was awful ad the arancini crust way overdone, very hard. I am Italian and I can tell that this is not Italian gusto. Not worth the money.
Went for restaurant week and the food was very good and staff was great. Was very busy because of a concert but they kept up with the service. We will be returning.
Great restaurant....authentic Italian food, great service and ambiance.
Me and my friend it was our first time at Gusto. Great service and the food was perfect! Real authentic! Will definitely be back when I’m in the area!
Very authentic presentation of italian favorites.  Don't miss the braciole with polenta. Also great are there pizzas prepared in oven shipped over from Italy
Excellent food,  excellent service! Highly recommend!
Food was delicious drinks were amazing just no parking
Food and service was great.

My sister, brother in law, boyfriend and I went here before a show to celebrate valentines day and my sisters birthday. Our waitress, I cant remember her name, was absolutely fantastic, the food was to die for, and they were super gracious and accommodating when we were 30 min late for our reservation on a super busy night! I'm not from Medford but I would gladly drive the hour there to eat there again! Absolutely phenomenal!
Great food
Very good 👍
Great neapolitan pizza, awesome artichoke prosciutto!

You wouldn't think it would be hard to find a good Italian restaurant in the 'burbs, but it is. So, we went to Real Italian Gusto with tempered expectations. What delightful surprise. We had an excellent Carbonara and Arrabiata, served at the bar.  Decent wine selection, and the bartender made a pretty good Martini. He managed well on a busy weekend night despite the fact that he was short one bartender.  I would go back without hesitation.
Trendy, lively. The pizza is really really really good.
Good Italian fare, not great, but satisfying. Prompt, friendly service. Clean, comfortable atmosphere. Soup and salad are the only vegetarian options.
Really enjoyed my meal. Service was solid, but everytime our waitress came over she looked like she was afraid of the table! I promise we dont bite and tip well!
Great margherita pizza. I did takeout and pizza was ready in less than 15 mins.
A simple but elegant experience..The food is clean tasting and makes you wanna slap your mama good.  🤣
Exemplary attentive service and delicious meals - save room for dessert!
Everything was great....food , service , atmospere.... All top notch

(Translated by Google) The best pizza since I moved in the area from Italy !!! We love you guys !!! Thanks for open this place !!!! The best pizza since we got to Boston. Thanks guys for bringing us the authentic Italian pizza !!!  (Original) The best pizza since I moved in the area from Italy!!! We love you guys!!! Thanks for open this place!!!! La pizza migliore da quando siamo arrivati a Boston. Grazie ragazzi per averci portato l'autentica pizza italiana!!!
This place is a perfect date for couples! Such a romantic setting with very delicious food. The prices are fair and affordable. Great experience.

two days ago was our first time in this magnificent restaurant. But It is absolutely not the last. We enjoyed the evening very much with the good service, with the first-rate cooking and fine drinks and with the comfortable price. We will definitely visit there again.

Nice restaurant. Cute decor. Food was good. We shared a margarita pizza and then I had salmon for my entire and my friend had the carbonara. It is a three minute walk to the Chevalier Theater so it was great to be able walk to our show after dinner. Parking was easy since we got there 2 and a half hours before our show and was able to find street parking. There are also two municipal lots near by. One is a block down the street behind the citizens bank.
Dress up or down; order delicious specials or just pizza. Great for romantic couples or families.  Surprisingly nice view inside. Lovely but unfussy. Service was perfect. Neighborhood gem.
Great food, great friendly servers/service, reasonably priced.  I recommend the meatballs and apple appetizer!
Great service and food!
Excellent food,  the service is great,  good atmosphere
Fantastic restaurant! Very nice in all ways. Great service and food.
Excellent food good service
We managed to get here after 4 years. We had Cuoppo which was fantastic, a great pizza and gnocchi. Definitely one of the best Italian restaurants in the Boston area, great job guys!

Though it looks like a narrow store front, it actually expands in the back to a light and airy dining room. An attractive bar takes up the narrow sections. Then there's the food; we have traveled in Italy several times , and we both found their menu items were a bit innovative and, better yet, very authentic. I can strongly recommend baked artichokes with prosciutto wrapper, the salad with arugula and bresaola, and the ravioli in limoncello sauce. All at the table were very happy with their choices.
delicious food, great customer service!
Ah-May zing!!! So happy to find a real Italian restaurant
Clean, new, good atmosphere restaurant. Food is good too.
Great wine selection combined with true Italian food

This is one of, if not the best, Italian restaurants I have been to. The artichokes wrapped in prosciutto with balsamic vinegar are incredible and unlike anything you can find elsewhere. We had the Chicken Marsala for our entree and the chicken was tender and the sauce was light and rich. I highly recommend - it's worth the trip!  (Also, the staff is kind as well!) We are from Raleigh, NC and will definitely be back.
Very good Neapolitan pizza one of the best in the Boston area.
Amazing food. I recommend everything.
Tasty food and great service. Music was excellent, too. Neoploi
Good food

It was a nice ambient setting with good wine selection. However, the salads were all lettuce for an expensive price, the pasta tasted canned and low quality. Similar to dog food texture. Good waiting service, nice view, horrible food.

The artichokes wrapped in prosciutto are delicious!!  They have this balsamic vinegar imported from Italy that is unlike any vinegar I've ever had; so incredibly sweet and paired perfectly with the smooth olive oil to dip my bread.  I wanted to keep things light so I havent tried the bigger portions (pastas or pizzas) - guess it's a reason to return soon!
The food was amazing. The service was outstanding. Recommenced.
Good...not fantastic. Service was awesome.
Beautiful inside, delicious food, very attentive wait staff
Great food in a bright casual setting.  Very fresh, great service!

(Translated by Google) Pizza is good but not enough for the price. The bottom of it is blackened (they probably seldom clean the oven surface). The waiters didn't know which planet they were on, we asked for beverages that never came. Plus I wouldn't call the owners friendly Answer: Hi Matteo, Sorry but I beg to disagree about cleaning the oven. In Italy we have a pizzeria, where I worked for years, and the bottom of the coal-flavored pizza is a clear sign that the oven floor is never cleaned during service. We put a wet rag on the shovel and clean it like this, two or three times during the service, or more if the wood "shoots" more than usual. As for friendliness, I'm sorry, maybe you were annoyed this time, or the first time, or the first one again ... actually when I come they are always in a group with 3000 children, certainly it doesn't help. Maybe next time you'll be amazed with special effects;)  (Original) Pizza is good but not enough for the price. The bottom of it is blackened (they probably seldom clean the oven surface). We were there for an event and the food wasn't even enough for all the participants, the quality really low.... The waiters didn't know which planet were on, we asked for beverages that never came. Plus I wouldn't call the owners friendly Answer: Ciao Matteo, Scusa ma mi permetto di dissentire riguardo alla pulizia del forno. In Italia abbiamo una pizzeria, dove ho lavorato per anni, e il fondo della pizza al gusto di carbone è chiaro segno che il pavimento del forno non viene mai pulito durante il servizio. Noi mettiamo uno straccio bagnato sulla pala e lo puliamo così, due o tre volte durante il servizio, o di più se il legno "spara" più del solito. Per quanto riguarda la friendliness mi spiace, forse eravate scocciati questa volta, o la volta prima, o quella prima ancora... effettivamente quando vengo sono sempre in gruppo con 3000 bambini, di certo non aiuta. Magari la prossima volta ci stupirete con effetti speciali ;)
Cute restaurant with a beautiful view. The Waite staff was attentive and the food was a delight. Recommend if you are in Medford.
It's a good Italian place.  The food is high quality and pizza is very good, but you can't customize anything.
If you will not seat a customer >40 minutes before closing, you need to update your hours. I wanted time coming here when I could’ve been seated elsewhere.  Be better
Trendy spot. Delicious food, great service.
Very nice place. A true jewel in the area. Great appetizers and fun talks with staff and the owners. Gusto incredibile. Grazie mille !

The food was below average. The staff was all Italian so we thought it would be relaxing. We sat at the bar and were rushed out. We kept putting him off even as we were told we needed to order. Even doing that we were out quick and they were not that busy.  Maybe it is more or a pizza place.
OMG: delicious. Fancy Italian food without fancy Italian food prices.  What a gem.
Excellent food and service!
Authentic Italian food and wonderful people.
Bellisima place,great food and ambiance

This is the first time we've been here in quite a while because I had gotten it in my head that it was slow service, okay food and high prices. Boy was I wrong.  We were a little later than we would usually eat - 8:30 rather than 7:30 - and the dining room was about half full. The bar was nearly full.  I ordered Stufato di Manzo con Polenta and it was absolutely delicious. The stew was beautifully flavored with fork-tender beef and potatoes. It was served with a couple of of stiff polenta medallions that had been crisped by deep frying and they were a real treat. I would have liked something green on the plate and if there were contorni on the menu, I probably would have ordered a side.  My partner had Veal Marsala, which was tender and flavorful and a generous enough portion that she had the leftover for lunch the following day. The veal did have some broccoli on the plate.  The wait staff was friendly and attentive and patient with our questions. Because of the hour, we skipped dessert but were tempted by the cannoli.  I think the check came to about $65 with the two entrées and one glass of wine.  We agreed that we should return soon and sample the pasta and the pizza and have some dessert next time.
Neighborhood pizza joint that's much more. Top Class neopolitan style pizza with fresh authentic ingredients. Food is prepared with love.
Very good food
Loved it! So authentic and delicious plus superb customer service!
Great place, great cooking, great hosting!
Excellent all around. Food,service, value and location..

Lovely, fresh, authentic Italian cuisine. Their pizzas are exquisite with high quality ingredients and a crust that is the perfect combination of crunch and chewiness. The owners/chefs are a nice young Italian couple committed to producing wonderful food.

(Translated by Google) Very nice but very kind staff efficient pizza excellent first sublime go with confidence 👍  (Original) Posto molto ma molto carino personale gentile efficiente pizza ottima primi sublimi andate con fiducia 👍
Pizza was beyond excellent, atmosphere felt like I was back in Italy!
Hidden gem in Medford square! Delicious food, creative menu, wonderful cocktails, great staff. Best Manhattan I’ve had in a while! Great views of the river. Definitely try this place out.
Service was good. Food was alright.
Nice people. Beautiful place
I love this place!

Ottimo. I would give six starts if I could. The tastes are almost similar to Naples pizza, with  mozzarella di bufala of Campania and tomatoes from Vesuvius. Cooking time is right, dough consistency exact. The service is perfect, timely and attentive.  Ambiance is serene with simple elegance and correctly illuminated. Prices are right for what is on offer. The views of Mystic river for day time must be beautiful. Will visit as often as possible.
Good atmosphere and food is delicious; great pizza and the lasagna is scrumptious.
It's whatever. Service was not great and the food was palatable, but nothing to write home about.

Server was incredibly rude and the food left a lot to be desired. I would not recommend this place to anyone. The atmosphere was very nice and it's a very nice place, I just wish the service was as nice as the atmosphere
The cuisine with excellent never had northern Italian food before
Great food with a great atmosphere!

Real Italian Gusto is the real thing! The decor is modern and clean with white wooden tables and chairs and the perfect amount of lightning; I could read the menu. 😁 The dinner menu is simple, but offers plenty of selections of appetizers, soups and salads, pasta dishes, and meat and veggie dishes. I am trying my hardest to stick to a lower carb diet and chose Real Italian Gusto because they offered these options. We started with the fried mozarella and it was the best I have ever had. Then we both had a cup of the minestrone soup, it was different from what we expected as it was in a white broth, but still very good. Then I had the antipasto starter as my entree and my husband got the lasagna. My antipasto was a variety of meats and cheeses, olives, and sun-dried tomatoes with a small mix of lettuces. My husband said his lasagna was really good. We both would like to come back during the summertime because their back doors open up on to the Mystic River and it looks pretty.
Excellent
Server Deanna was AMAZING. Food was good and the atmosphere fun and clean. We went to a show down the street and this was a great place to eat before. Pizza, entrees, and apps phenomenal.
Food and server Deanna were excellent!!!
Great restaurant very nice place i Defenetly recommend this place very professional...
Good food and nice friendly owners and staff
Very clean. Helpful staff.  The apps and 3 pizza's our table ordered was very flavorful but honestly overpriced
Excellent place. The owners are the chefs and they are amazing. Excellent service. Great food.
Excellent food and service. It's a lot bigger than you'd expect. Goes all the way to the Mystic river in the back.

Really good Italian food.  It feels authentic, whatever that means.  The space is simple, clean, but not cheap looking, and the food is delicious.  I like that the servers pay attention to where you are in your meal, so you shouldn't get your main dish if you're still working on your soup or appetizers.  They have a nice selection of pizzas too though the beer selection is limited. I usually just order one of the two Italian brands.
5/5 for food and service. 3/5 atmosphere, the river view is very nice but there was a very noticeable bleach-y smell throughout the place that was off putting
Amazing gem of a restaurant! All the food was amazing, drinks are reasonably priced, and the location is very nice! Will go again!
Authentic Italian, great pizza...
Worst place ever
Favorite Italian Restaurant 😊 Service is Fantastic, Chief was so kind to make a pasta that wasn't on the menu for me because of a diet issue. PLEASE TRY, You'll become a Regular ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
First time visiting this place, the food was amazing and the service was excellent. Will definitely be back soon
Slow, incompetent service...owner inflexible to accommodate new customers for menu options...we walked out never to return!
Real Italian quality food

We've only been here once so far, but it is excellent for dining. She had frutti del Mar (fruit of the see, risotto and shellfish), and loved it. I had veal marsalla, it was pretty good, excellent veal, slightly sweet for my taste (slight spinkle of salt suggested.) Dessert was good, as well. The tiramisu was good, and the profiteroles were excellent.
Excellent salad and pasta

best Italian food in the area. puts all other chain restaurants to shame.  nestled in Medford center definitely worth going to if you want real Authentic  Italian food  all homemade pasta unbelievable pizza and they cater to all food allergies are very airy refreshing environment
Delicious pasta and pizza! Yummy cannoli!

One of the better restaurants in Medford that I've tried. I like the pizzas, the eggplant parm, and the profiteroles. Seems like they use fresh ingredients. I'm not fond of the fried mozzarella (too doughy) and find the pastas a bit bland. (I've tried the carbonara, pesto, and funghi.) Not enough sauce or perhaps seasonings. I'd give the restaurant 3.5 stars -- where 5 is maybe a L'Espalier, and 1 is maybe a Ninety-Nine Restaurant.

Food is decently priced for authentic, fresh Italian food. Everything that we had was great and I would definitely come back. This place would compete with any place I've been to in the north end food wise but I would give it a leg up since you don't have to worry about parking and all the flocks of tourists.
Great food, great service! Several members of my party are vegan and they all were pleased with the options available.
Seared scallops limoncello....awesome!

Awesome spot! Owned by a nice Italian couple that aims to create an authentic Italian experience - dishes are properly portioned and not food-coma inducing, ingredients are authentic and fresh, and the ambiance is clean and modern. Must try!
Great modern Italian food! Relaxed atmosphere, real Italian food. The pizza oven is even imported from Italy, well done!
Delicious food!
One of the few spots outside the city that makes authentic Italian food. Highly recommend the pizza! You can also find them on Uber eats!
Always amazing. Very authentic Roman experience.
Slow, Italian style service. Food was great. They adjusted entrees for vegan options.

We went here today for my husband’s bday dinner. Its a little busy for a Wednesday night. There was only one waitress, and she seems to be having trouble on how to use the pc/tablet. She kept cursing and customers can hear her. We have a minor with us on the table that hears her. We also heard her  say “i want to get the f*** out of here” “i hate this” “i hate this place” “i hate my life”  and it totally ruined the mood, we get it, that it can be overwhelming, but you dont say those things and its not acceptable to show that attitude. She argues with the cooks and the guy at the bar. We can see and hear everything. This place is not ready for crowd,there were two birthdays tonight,  they are all over the place and not organized, and not prepared. Totally ruined our appetite no matter how good the food was. The order came in so late too. The one star is for the food and nothing more.
Great authentic Italian cuisine. Nicely decorated and very relaxed staff. Who knew Medford Square held such a hidden gem?
Minestrone soup is to die for. Try it for lunch, you'll be pleasantly surprised.
Wonderful authentic Italian food.  Great bistro decor. Better than most North End places with plenty of free parking in Medford Square.
A decent compendium of plainly plated Italian dishes that use good and authentic ingredients. The wine list is pricey, and the wine pours are skimpy.
The most authentic Italian pizza outside of Naples
Every thing was amazing... the staff is courteous and even a simple marsala chicken was fantastic
Desserts are fabulous, meal was good too
Gorgeous inside. Lunch lasagna was good but could have done with more filling. 90% pasta
Fantastic atmosphere...lots of homemade pasta dishes at reasonable prices.

Really incredible food!  Everything so fresh + delicious!  Great atmosphere, beautifully decorated!  Honestly one of the best meals I've had in a long time!  Can guarantee you'll enjoy!  A definite must try!
Absolutely delicious. Reasonably priced for quality food.

I've ordered a valdostana pizza the waitress brought me a margherita pizza. I told her she brought me the wrong pizza. She took the pizza back to the pizzaiolo.  She brought it back with the speck on top.  I paid a margherita pizza $19.

Nice atmosphere. The dining room is warm during the winter because the entrance is on the other side where the bar is located. The food was similar to the cuisine in Italy. Our waitress, Lindsay, was terrific and personable.
Somewhat pricey given the quality of the food. We ordered an expensive bottle of wine that they didnt pour at our table.

Wow. Just. Wow.  You won't be dissapointed. A hidden gem. Every Italian restaurant claims to bring the real flavors of Italy to you, but few actually deliver. This place does. Loved it, highly recommended.
Authentic Italian food reasonably priced.
My wife and I both had spaghetti carbarnara which was just OK, kind of dry, not the creamy flavor one expects. Not sure I'd rush back. Service was good.

Nice place.  Go here when visiting son at college.  Beautiful ceramic pizza oven imported from Italy.  Pizza, bolognese,ravioli are all good.  I've been here a couple of times and have always been happy.   Sometimes slow when it gets crowded.
(Translated by Google) Great food ... a little expensive but very good products.  (Original) Ottimo cibo...un po costoso ma prodotti molto buoni.
Fantastic. I have enjoyed every morsel, since I started visiting the restaurant.
Yummy food! Pricey, but a good choice for special occasions. Delicious thin crust pizzas, mouth-watering appetizers, and flavorful pastas.
Great chef platter and pizza!

Came to this restaurant for my friend’s 30th birthday. I didn’t expect this restaurant to be this nice since it is a pizza place. Very spacious and clean. Also it has a home feeling. The service was very nice. They kept the cake for me and serviced it at the end of the dinner. The appetites was nice and the cocktail was amazing. The pizza was decent, but not as good as what I had in Europe.
The food was delicious!!
Everything was perfect

Ordered delivery. Hot dishes were cold to the middle. Salads and Pastas were three bites. Maybe I missed something not dining in, still I live a football field away from the restaurant and had to nuke my food. I simply won't order again.

A very pleasant surprise with excellent food at affordable prices. The pizzas were very much like the ones that I enjoyed in Italy. Very close to the best pizza that I've ever had. I recommend this place highly.
Wonderful raviolis stuffed with pears and walnuts, paired with a great red wine. If you've never been to this great restaurant, you really need to try it out.
Wonderful owners, delicious food.
Good italian food
Loved the Romana salad!  Margherita pizza with peppers was delicious.  Wish the wine pour was a little more.  I will definitely return.  Great service and food.
The salad, mushroom pappardelle and lasagna were delecious! It was our 2nd time at Real Gusto. A great local find.
Authentic Italian food, awesome cappuccino and great ambience

Saturday 6 pm wait for  8 people food preparation was over an hour and a half long. Chicken masala was tasteless and over cooked. Veal with prosciutto was not much better. Pizza and beer was good. Price for one appetizer 7 main courses one kids meal and 2 beers was almost $200 with the tips.
Great food, great service... Its couple from Italy that runs this place. Food is just amazing... Very comfortable ambient.
The Pizza is out of this world and is truly the best in the Boston area. They use the highest quality and the freshest ingredients in all of their dishes.
Amazing food, great wine selection, nice atmosphere. Italian, not Italian American food. Highly recommend.
Beautiful ambience and delicious reasonably priced food. The pizzas are the best around.  Friendly Italian owners, authentic cuisine.
Good food and drinks
Awesome food. The desert is the best I have ever had
Nice people, real good Italian Cuisine.

Amazing experience for dinner and a corporate holiday party.  The food , ambiance, hospitality was exceptional both in a small dinner setting to our corporate holiday party. Our employees rated this one of the best holiday parties!  Matteo & Francesca and family bring Italy to Medford. Pasta pizza salads all delicious. The staff is accommodating and friendly!  If you haven't been you must visit. You won't be disappointed.

Nice place with very nice personnel, but the food did not all live up to expectations. Pasta was slightly undercooked, and taste was a bit too bitter. Vegetables with the meat where somewhat unbalanced. Lemon sorbet was a great dessert though, so it might have been bad luck/ choice in dishes. Will try again!
Excellent food and atmosphere
The best pizza ever! They use a wood fired oven made by Italian craftsmen. They have a phenomenal wine menu as well.
excellent siciliano :) good service good wine and good recipes

What a pleasure. A wonderful space with an open kitchen which offers a real buzz. The menu is fairly traditional fare but with homemade pasta and pizza done to a really high standard, it's definitely worth a visit. Really great to have this so close in a Medford. The salumi platter was great and accompanied by a delicious pickled eggplant  relish. By far the best dish of our evening was the daily special, truffle and porcini ravioli.  Interested to check out the store/ delivery during the day.
It was excellent with authentic Italian dishes.
Classic Italian food in the modern style.  Simple recipes made excellent by attention to using fresh high quality ingredients.

From the moment you walk in  do you feel like you're at your family's house.  Not only due to the hospitality of the staff,  but just the feel of the restaurant.  We had met our cousin  Who is up visiting and I forgot that I was in a restaurant.  The wine list was amazing,  and the food was  decadent.  Make sure that when you go  you and the mail with a shot of their limoncello.
Food is delicious great prices and great quality hidden gem
Have eaten here several times and picked up Pizza to go. Pasta, apps and pizza have exceeded my Italian North End upbringing. Highly recommend a visit to Medford Square.
Absolutely incredible food - completely authentic experience from the owners to the food. To die for wine list.
Fantastic Italian food, amazing pizza end risotto!
